data.title: Conway Twitty – Friar’s Point, Coahoma County, Mississippi
data.meta_description: Mississippi Country Music Trail The Mississippi Country Music Trail marker commemorating Conway Twitty is outside the North Delta Museum and the U.S. Post Office on 2nd Street in Friar’s Poin…
data.text:
Mississippi Country Music Trail

The Mississippi Country Music Trail marker commemorating Conway Twitty is outside the North Delta Museum and the U.S. Post Office on 2nd Street in Friar’s Point, Coahoma County, Mississippi.

Here are some photos of the Mississippi Country Music Trail marker commemorating Conway Twitty:

Here is a map showing the location of the North Delta Museum in Friar’s Point, Mississippi:

Here are some videos of Conway Twitty:

Here is a short documentary on Conway Twitty:

Some other sights to see in Friar’s Point include:

The former Hirsberg’s Drug Store were many blues musicians, including Robert Johnson, Robert Nighthawk used to play in the 1930’s.

Mississippi Blues Trail marker for Robert Nighthawk:
